review: We have had this for almost 2 weeks now and I am ready to cancel my expensive cable.  It was SUPER easy to set up and now we have Hulu and Netflix and it pretty much covers all of the TV we were paying almost $200 a month for for less than $15 a month for those subscriptions.  Not to mention all of the other freebies on there.  It also ties into our iPad if we want to play something on any other apps that might not be on there.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone!

review: Easily integrated into my heavily apple-centric household.  I mainly use it for streaming stuff from my Amazon Prime account on my iPad.  I'm even able to stream the audio separately to my old Airport Express, which is nice.The interface is a bit clunky...works best with an ipad or iphone as the remote, IMO.I wish Apple had a comparable service to Prime, but let's be honest, it just isn't there yet.  The built in streaming channels are OK for an occasional diversion, but not much more than that.  I'm hoping the next software revision includes something new, content-wise.
